name: Water Water Everywhere (Team Auboreal, Kowara, MOTFgames, Zilonis123, lisamichele, Ategon, Ayoub Gharbi, Coeur, GameboyFunny, shad, isaac tumor/Arbel amram, DeanAbadPixels, Leafcutter537, NnYGames, Trigw)
name_original: Water Water Everywhere (Team Auboreal, Kowara, MOTFgames, Zilonis123, lisamichele, Ategon, Ayoub Gharbi, Coeur, GameboyFunny, shad, isaac tumor/Arbel amram, DeanAbadPixels, Leafcutter537, NnYGames, Trigw)
description:
Water Water Everywhere

As a young sailor, you find yourself stranded on a series  of tropical islands! Fight your way to an escape while making sure to not die of thirst.

NOTE: If the game does not work well on browser, you may need to use a different browser, Firefox should work well for instance, or download the game. Controls

WASD - Move

Left Click - Melee Attack & Interact with UI

Right Click - Ranged Attack

Space - Dash

Z - Pick up & Buy

Credits

MOTFgames - Management

Ategon - Art, Coding

DeanAbad - Art

Leafcutter - Coding

GameboyFunny101 - Coding

GhPanda - Coding

NnY - Coding, Design

Shad - Design
